hero.title: Solve Crimes in Your
hero.description: Immersive detective games delivered to your doorstep. Collect clues, interrogate suspects, and solve the crime with friends and family.

products.title: Choose Your Mystery
products.description: Each game includes physical evidence, suspect interviews, digital clues, and everything you need to crack the case.

step1.title: Order Your Game
step1.description: Choose your mystery and receive a beautifully packaged game with all materials included.

step2.title: Access Digital Content
step2.description: Use your unique code to unlock clues, evidence, and downloadable materials online.

step3.title: Solve the Mystery
step3.description: Work together to collect clues, analyze evidence, and submit your solution.

footer.description: Immersive detective games delivered to your home.

faqItems.access: How do I access my game?

gameAccess.title: Access Your Game
gameAccess.description: Enter the access code from your purchase confirmation email to unlock your game materials.
gameAccess.errorInvalidCode: Invalid access code. Please check your code and try again.
gameAccess.successMessage: Access granted! Welcome to your private investigation area.
gameAccess.cantFindCodeDescription: Check your purchase confirmation email or contact us at
